metadata.scenario: Customer service interaction about a delayed package

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'm trying to find out where my package is. The tracking number is 1234567890.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello! Thank you for providing your tracking number. I can certainly help with that. Let me look it up for you. One moment, please...

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, thanks. I've been expecting it for a week now. The estimated delivery date was yesterday.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I apologize for the delay. According to the tracking information, the package is currently in transit and is expected to arrive tomorrow. It appears there was a slight delay in the sorting facility.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Tomorrow? Seriously? The sorting facility? What's the hold up? That's incredibly frustrating.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your frustration. Unfortunately, I don't have specific details about the delay at the sorting facility. However, I can assure you that our team is working to get your package delivered as quickly as possible. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Can you at least tell me *why* there's a delay? Is it a staffing issue, weather, or what? It doesn't inspire confidence when I don't know anything.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I apologize, but I am unable to provide the specifics of the delay. The information is not available to me at this time. However, it is expected to arrive tomorrow.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Alright. Fine. I guess there's nothing you can do. Thanks anyway.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: You're welcome. If the package does not arrive tomorrow, please contact us again, and we will look into it further. Have a good day!
